Class TransitionImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.statefulj.fsm.model.impl.DeterministicTransitionImpl<T>
      • org.statefulj.framework.core.fsm.TransitionImpl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Stateful Entity type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transition<T>

    public class TransitionImpl<T>
extends DeterministicTransitionImpl<T>
    Extend DeterministicTransitionImpl to provide additional functionality such as "any" transition support and reloading support
    Author:
    Andrew Hall
